pkgmetadata.longdescription: python-timezones----------------![](https://github.com/Doist/python-timezones/workflows/Tests/badge.svg)A Python library that provides better selection of common timezones,can output HTML and auto select the best timezone based on user's IP.Visit https://doist.github.io/python-timezones/ for more information.Copyright: 2012-2023 by DoistLicense: MIT.
